goal.en: To build the essential mathematical skills required for the students of the department of Atmospheric Sciences
goal.ch: 奠定大氣系同學所需之基本數學能力

content.en:
*1st ODE
*2nd ODE
*Higher-order ODE
*Power series methods
*Laplace transform
*Linear algebra
*Eigenvalue problem
*Fourier series
*PDE
*Complex analysis
content.ch:
*1階常微分方程
*2階常微分方程
*高階常微分方程
*冪級數解法
*拉普拉斯轉換
*線性代數
*特徵值問題
*傅立葉展開
*偏微分方程
*複變函數分析

textbook.en: Advanced Engineering Mathematics, 10th Edition Update, Erwin Kreyszig.
textbook.ch: *Advanced Engineering Mathematics, 10th Edition Update, Erwin Kreyszig.
